attributes.action: Ban the media from publishing stories on all current military operations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The media constantly publish stories on what is actually going on in warzones such as Iraq and Afganistan. This has to stop. 

Many of times when we watch the news there is reporter informing the public on where our troops are, what they are doing and what they plan to do next. This is endangering the welfare of our military personel currently stationed in these warzones. 

The public have a right to know what is going on, but when that information might endanger the lives of many there is no excuse to publish it. 

There is every possibility that this information could fall into the wrong hands and take away any advantage our troops might have.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
